name: DailyThings
0:
”Alexa, Open Daily Things”
”Alexa, ask Daily Things to give me another idea”
”Alexa, Start Daily Things and give me a daily thing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily things
des: My Daily Things skill that will randomly give you ideas on something to try for the first time. Or if you are just bored it will give you something to do. From working out, to cooking, or even building something! This is the perfect skill to give yourself a new hobby or a new fun thing to attempt in life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
